document_data.mainbody:
Tholiqarn was a mind flayer active in the Northdark in the late 15 century DR.
Tholiqarn was one of a number of mind flayers who followed Qholillaroon to establish a colony in the Heartcoil Deeps with the ultimate goal of threatening Waterdeep. However, Tholiqarn was the first of his bretheren to encounter a party of adventurers sent by Waterdeeps Open Lord, Laeral Silverhand, to investigate the chaos that the mind flayers arrival had caused. Tholiqarn was forced to fight them without the aid of any thralls, and was defeated.
